snippet.title: Dumb Ways: Free For All | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
DUMB WAYS: FREE FOR ALL, DOWNLOAD NOV 6 2PM PDT / NOV 7 AEDT ON META QUEST! https://www.meta.com/experiences/dumb-ways-free-for-all/7763282913797845/

The wait is over, Dumb Ways: Free For All is OUT NOW! Players will be greeted by the hard working Ninny, in charge of the ‘mostly safe’ and chaotic travel company, Dumb Tours, and here is where the crazy adventure begins. 

Travel to Bumbling Bay and Jumble Jungle solo or bring up to FIVE players along for the ride, where you can play 50 dumb and fun minigames, in a wild free for all! Each minigame playlist, or ‘Tours’, is loaded with wacky challenges and activities, where players will compete for the top score – but beware of sabotage from your fellow Bean travelers, who will do anything to throw you off your game and ruin your vacation! 

Join our discord to find fellow Beans to travel with! https://discord.gg/PtAazz6zZf

Kick back and get ready for your next adventure in The Airport Lounge, where you can personalize your Bean at the Duty-Free Kiosk. Earn XP and level up by completing Tours to unlock new accessories for your Beans! 

But that’s not all… two FREE DLC updates are on their way! On December 9th, you will be able to travel to Freezerville and in January, to Beanulon Prime. Each update will include an extra 25 minigames to up the total to 100 MINIGAMES and keep the free for all fun rolling!

So what are you waiting for?! Download Dumb Ways: Free For All NOW!! 

Dumb Ways: Free For All is $19.99 USD on the Meta Quest Store, check your local site for pricing 

---

https://www.tiktok.com/@dumbwaystodie
https://www.instagram.com/official_dumbwaystodie
